Articles.Content:
Well, it's my first thread so I don't know how start it. I created this trhead to comment and suggest easter eggs for add to the game. I don't know if Squad wants to add any new easter egg, but I think that this could be interesting, so my intention is make this thread for a brainstorming.

I start:

You probably read or heard some about Arthur C. Clarke's book "Rendezvous with Rama". I think tah this book is a work of art for any who likes space science fiction.

My suggestion is a "little" Rama (scale 1:3 (13 kilometres large, 3 wide) , 1:4 (10 kilometres large, 2.5 wide) or 1:1 (40 kilometres large, 10 wide)) in orbit around a planet (or moon). The game should recognize it as an asteroid or a little moon. (or didn't recognize it, if you saw an object of 10 kilometres in orbit of a planet and doesn't appear in the orbit map, you should investigate it).

Because Rama, in Arthur C. Clarke's novel hasn't got any hall mark and alll it's surface is uniform (except for trhee little mountains in the north pole), i don't think that make this could supose much effort than another easter egg.

A greeting and thanks to Squad for the excellent work that they do.

PS1: Sorry for my horrible English.

PS2: Did the game will be translated to Spanish? When?

I loved the Rama series. To be honest I prefer it to the 2001 series.

If this was put in, you'd need to be able to enter the craft (at least I'd be dissapointed if you couldn't.) That's where I think this might become problematic.

Are there enough place for each fictional place in Kerbal world? And why fictional, if there are real anomalies, like Nazca-Lines?

PS: read the "already suggested" and the "do not suggest" topik!

Yep, unfortunately this is on the WNTS list. They already know, they'll probably add more soon. I've heard rumors of the Magic Boulder coming back soon

This said, since it is WNTS, I'll close this thread.
